intro: Dracaena foetida, commonly known as the Little Zebra plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and southern Asia. It is characterized by its distinctive, narrow, dark green leaves with white or yellow variegation patterns. The plant produces small, inconspicuous greenish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in bright, indirect light and prefers well-draining soil. Dracaena foetida is a popular choice for indoor gardening due to its low maintenance and attractive appearance.
